title: The Little Sparrow Named 'Too'
description: The Little Sparrow Named 'Too'The first picture book in The Adventures of Too series tells how a little sparrow learns that “Mother knows best”.The Little Sparrow Named ‘Too’, is a modern yet fun adaption based on the Greek myth of Icarus. The bedtime story teaches children about parental respect and humility. It also touches on the underlying theme in all The Adventures of Too books - There is no reward in being naughty!
author: E. Dantes
